attributes.action: With the rising prices and many households now slipping into poverty cut VAT
attributes.additional_details: The government should now cut the VAT tax on fuel to 5% to help all of the people in the UK to try and survive during these desperate times.
attributes.background: The Government is now in the the position of having an increased revinue from the VAT (30 %) imposed on the price of petrol at the pumps. This equates to a winfull the same as the oil producers have now been at long last been taxed.

rejection.details:
We have published the following similar petitions, which you might like to sign:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Halve fuel duty and remove VAT on fuel prices: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618421
